BOT_TOKEN.description: Make a bot from @BotFather and paste the bot token here.

DATABASE_URL.description: Only use mongodb url here. Get it from https://mongodb.com/

HANDLERS.description: Lis of handlers seperated with a space to use for userbot command trigger.

LOGGER_ID.description: The chat id of your logging channel/group.

OWNER_ID.description: Get it from @LOVELYR_OBOT by writing /id in pm

HEROKU_APPNAME.description: Your heroku app name. Get it from the top of this page.

HEROKU_APIKEY.description: Heroku api key. Get it from https://dashboard.heroku.com/account
